member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiContainer.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the container theme. The default is determined by the operating system. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiContainer.Menu
member.summary: Gets or sets the element to display as menu. Window buttons in maximized mode will be on the same level. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiContainer.MdiLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the element to display as menu. Window buttons in maximized mode will be on the same level. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiContainer.InnerHeight
member.summary: Gets correct canvas height for internal usage.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiContainer.Children
member.summary: Gets or sets the child elements.

member.name: T:WPF.MDI.MdiLayout
member.summary: Specifies the layout of MdiChild windows in an MdiContainer control.

member.name: F:WPF.MDI.MdiLayout.Cascade
member.summary: All MdiChild windows are cascaded within the client region of the MdiContainer control.

member.name: F:WPF.MDI.MdiLayout.TileHorizontal
member.summary: All MdiChild windows are tiled horizontally within the client region of the MdiContainer control.

member.name: F:WPF.MDI.MdiLayout.TileVertical
member.summary: All MdiChild windows are tiled vertically within the client region of the MdiContainer control.

member.name: F:WPF.MDI.MdiLayout.ArrangeIcons
member.summary: All MdiChild icons are arranged within the client region of the MdiContainer control.

member.name: M:WPF.MDI.MdiChild.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The that contains the event data. This event data reports details about the mouse button that was pressed and the handled state.

member.summary: Gets or sets the window icon. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiChild.ShowIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to [show the window icon]. This is a dependency property.
member.value: true if [show the window icon]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiChild.Resizable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the [window is resizable]. This is a dependency property.
member.value: true if [window is resizable]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiChild.Focused
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the [window is focused]. This is a dependency property.
member.value: true if [window is focused]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiChild.MinimizeBox
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to [show the minimize box button]. This is a dependency property.
member.value: true if [show the minimize box button]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:WPF.MDI.MdiChild.MaximizeBox
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to [show the maximize box button]. This is a dependency property.
member.value: true if [show the maximize box button]; otherwise, false.
